We're reaching prospects we could never get to before, and the response has been great. It's a sales program that lets us compete against large companies.", name: 'Sarah Johnson', title: 'Marketing Director', }, { quote: "The cost savings compared to our old email campaigns are staggering. Not only are we spending less, but the results are 50x better. I can't recommend it enough.", name: 'Gunderson Helscroft', title: 'CEO', }, ]; return (

); }; export default LandingPage;
